about:
Welcome to my portfolio! 

 I'm a self-taught web developer. I embarked on this journey after nearly a decade in the Finance industry. After a successful career in management, I decided solving complex problems as an independent contributor is my passion. 

 After 2 batches at the Recurse Center, building a number of solo and collaborative projects, and volunteering for some great local causes, I'm ready to begin my first professional role as a full-stack or front-end software engineer for a company that values my self-motivation and eagerness to learn.

projects.name: RC Collaborator
projects.description: Full-stack application for Recursers to showcase projects and foster collaboration. Implemented authentication with RC's OAuth API, established end-to-end and unit tests, created a responsive UI, and established a CI and deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions.

projects.name: GitHub Star Tagger
projects.description: Application that fetches starred repos from GitHub's REST API and allows users to add and filter tags.

projects.name: Cost of Drinking
projects.description: Interactive map displaying the cost of living index based on beer prices. Scraped, cleaned, and merged data from multiple sources. Joined the data with geographical information and created dataframes.

projects.name: MST Waypoint to Trackpoint Converter
projects.description: Conversion tool for the Mountains to Sea Trail, a local nonprofit, to map waypoint data to the closest corresponding trackpoint. Converts data into a standardized CSV format for download.

projects.name: NC Nonprofit Job Scraper
projects.description: Tool which scrapes new nonprofit jobs from an NC job site and sends results as a Telegram message.

projects.name: Etch-A-Sketch
projects.description: Etch-A-Sketch created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to learn about CSS Grid.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: Calculator created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript including keyboard shortcuts

projects.name: "Pearl"-sonal Finance Hacker
projects.description: Personal Finance Flowchart and checklist created at Pearl Hacks 2021 Hackathon
